title: WTB- Ray Ryan needed to finish the 520!  PSA 2-6
author: trambo

posts.post_title: WTB- Ray Ryan needed to finish the 520!  PSA 2-6
posts.post_content:
I'm down to just ONE to finish the 520 so I thought I'd post here to see if anyone may be willing to assist.  Looking for PSA 3-5 range of the below but would also consider 2's and 6's.  Looked on ebay and don't see anything that makes sense.

Here's the list:

 
Ryan, Ray 


Feel free to PM if you have any of the above you'd consider selling.

Thanks in advance!!
Now down to 7!  thanks for the assists!!!

Gaining on it but still need a few!  PM if you are looking to sell the above.

Thanks!!

..and then there were FIVE!! 

Thanks to all who have reached out!
My first post was 13 needed.  Now there are FOUR!  Thanks to those who have helped me w/those nine cards!

...and now down to three needed.  They are:


Elberfield, Kid (Washington Portrait)
Ryan, Ray

Let me know if you have a PSA 3-6 available in any of the above.  I've had a bunch of success with this thread thus far (from 13 to 3) so getting to the finish line would be awesome! 

Thanks!!

Down to the final card for the 520 set.  Looking for PSA 2-6 in either of the following:

Ray Ryan


Thanks!!
